features: Versatile wear: The minimalist design and regular fit make this tee really versatile
Moisture management: Featuring lots of Tencel, this tee is naturally breathable, great at absorbing moisture and also anti-bacterial
Natural comfort: The soft natural blend is stretchy yet resistant and really comfortable
Regular fit: On tops and bottoms, Regular fit is a wider fir than active fit, but slimmer than relaxed fit
Tencel®: Naturally breathable, this eco-fabric is excellent at managing moisture(50% greater absorption than cotton)and has anti-bacterial properties
